thread.title: Why Kodi isn't illegal: Cutting through the media's misreporting
thread.title_full: Why Kodi isn't illegal: Cutting through the media's misreporting

author: Richard Devine
title: Why Kodi isn't illegal: Cutting through the media's misreporting
text:
There's some media hype about the "Kodi crackdown," but there's a lot of misinformation out there.
At least over here in the UK, media stories about police raids relating to Kodi boxes and the authorities "cracking down" are becoming more and more frequent. But here's the thing: Mostly these stories sensationalize for a headline and gloss over the actual meat of the subject.
But here's the thing: Kodi is not and will not become illegal.
